edz.name: EdiZon
edz.switchcheatsdb.name: SwitchCheatsDB
edz.patreon.name: Patreon
edz.widget.integer.title: Enter a value
edz.widget.integer.subtitle: This will be the new value for this property.
edz.widget.string.title: Enter some text
edz.widget.string.subtitle: This will be the new text for this property.
edz.gui.main.cheats.label.desc: Cheats are small programs that are executed in the background while a title is running. Multiple times per second these programs edit the memory of the currently running title. Important to note is, cheats are very fragile. If made incorrectly, changing the area in a game or even just restarting the console can make them stop working. If made properly, a game update will in most cases still break all cheats though and they have to be remade.
edz.gui.main.cheats.error.no_cheats: There are no cheats installed for this game.
edz.gui.main.cheats.error.no_title: There's no title running in the background at the moment. Open any title, press the home button and launch EdiZon via the Album without closing the title to toggle cheats.
edz.gui.main.cheats.error.syntax_error: There are cheats for this game installed on your system but the cheat service failed to parse it. Checkout the guide for reasons why this could happen.
edz.gui.main.cheats.error.outdated: There are cheats for this game installed but they were made for a different game version. If this game just got updated, please be patient as the cheat needs to be redone.
edz.gui.main.cheats.error.application_mo: EdiZon is running in application mode and cannot modify the memory of the current title. Please restart EdiZon in Applet mode by opening it through the Album.
edz.gui.main.cheats.error.dmnt_cht_missi: EdiZon depends on the dmnt:cht service to run cheats. Please make sure you installed your CFW correctly and that it has support for it.
edz.gui.main.settings.not_logged_in: To use most of the online features of EdiZon (save uploading and automatic cheats update) a SwitchCheatsDB account is required. Please visit switchcheatsdb.com for more information.
edz.gui.main.settings.email.help: Please enter your SwitchCheatsDB email address
edz.gui.main.about.label.edz: EdiZon is a multipurpose game enhancement tool for the Nintendo Switch. Special thanks to everybody that got involved in the development of this homebrew.
edz.gui.main.about.guide.title: EdiZon Guide
edz.gui.main.about.guide.subtitle: A getting started Guide for EdiZon
edz.gui.main.about.docs.title: EdiZon Documentation
edz.gui.main.about.docs.subtitle: The EdiZon developer documentation
edz.gui.popup.error.nosavefs: There's no save filesystem present for this title. In order to inject save files one has to be created first. This can be done by either opening this title and saving once or by clicking on the button bellow.
edz.gui.popup.information.playtime: Played %d times for %d hours and %d minutes
edz.gui.popup.management.backup.title: Create backup
edz.gui.popup.management.backup.subtitle: Create a backup of your save data
edz.gui.popup.management.backup.keyboard: Enter a name under which the backup will be saved
edz.gui.popup.management.restore.title: Restore backup
edz.gui.popup.management.restore.subtitl: Restore a previously created save file backup
edz.gui.popup.management.backup.dropdown: Select the backup you want to restore
edz.gui.popup.management.delete.title: Delete save data
edz.gui.popup.management.delete.subtitle: Delete the save data this game
edz.gui.popup.management.createfs.title: Create Save FS
edz.gui.popup.management.createfs.subtit: Create a save file system for this title and account
